CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
C has much more language than he generally uses; M sarcastic and unkind; C temper tantrum

u.a: shakes head no and buries further into M's lap
<bef> reaches for container in M's hand
C whimpers and throws head back in M's lap
tries to push him away toward blocks
talks with head in M's lap
<bef> C still whining in M's lap
<bef> C stays M's lap grimacing and making little whines
flops head down in M's lap
struggles to push M's hands away
doesn't want C near while he's whining
<bef> C walks away toward door; M pulls him back
<bef> C buries head in M's lap
buries head in M's lap then stands and looks around
<aft> C backs into M's lap; M pushes him around facing her
<bef> C cries then returns and puts his head in her lap
<aft> C has head on arm in her lap maybe looking in mirror
moves her leg that he was leaning on
<aft> C maintains pout face at M after she lets go
<aft> C resists and puts head back in M's lap
to E's instruction that C may have cookie while C lolls on M's lap
<aft> C flops backwards into M's lap
stands and goes to snack box on shelf
looks in box and plays with pitcher lid
pats her knee and lifts C into her lap
C tries to take lid off
<aft> C takes the cracker M set out for him
C starts to get more juice
<bef> C bounces in chair; is seated with M
C drops down out of chair; must have hit M on way out of chair
tries to pour but none comes out
napkin and cracker next to him fell from table
<aft> C drinks some and pours some into M's cup
<bef> C squashes his and her cup and puts toward box
